title: How to use commas better - Quora

response.answer_text: A lot of commas are used unnecessarily. The rule I follow is to use commas to structure my reader’s expectations, rather than try to follow any rulebook about comma use. If you think a comma would help the reader, put it in, Otherwise leave it out or use some other sort of punctuation, like a period or semicolon or colon, if that would help the reader.
